original_text: And he gave him none inheritance in it, no, not so much as to set his foot on: yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when as yet he had no child.
korean_text: 그러나 여기서 발 붙일 만한 땅도 유업으로 주지 아니하시고 다만 이 땅을 아직 자식도 없는 그와 그의 후손에게 소유로 주신다고 약속하셨으며

sentences.original_text: And he gave him none inheritance in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그에게 그곳에서 아무 상속도 주지 않았고

sentences.original_text: no, not so much as to set his foot on
sentences.korean_translation: 아니, 발을 디딜 만큼도 주지 않았으나

sentences.original_text: that he would give it to him for a possession
and to his seed after him
when as yet he had no child
